sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: This tool receives a record number and uses the record number prefix to find the parent table. This tool is useful if the user provides a record number in their prompt, but doesn't specify which table the record comes from.
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.inputs: [{"name":"record_number","value":"","description":"The unique number identifier from the record on the table.","mandatory":true,"invalidMessage":null}]
